items.title: Shade match in daylight
items.body: Always check base shades near a window or outdoors. Your phone screen can distort color—reduce brightness to 50%.

items.title: Lash curl that lasts
items.body: Heat the curler slightly with a hair dryer for 3 seconds, curl in 3 pulses from base to tip, then seal with waterproof.

items.title: Sweat‑proof base
items.body: Layer a thin film of setting spray between skincare and base, and again after powder for longevity.
